title: Our 6-Step Process
subtitle: Each project follows our carefully crafted methodology to ensure success

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We begin by thoroughly understanding your business objectives and challenges

steps.title: Research Design
steps.description: Custom methodology development tailored to your specific needs

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: Rigorous primary and secondary research from multiple sources

steps.title: Analysis & Insights
steps.description: Advanced analytics to uncover meaningful patterns and opportunities

steps.title: Strategy Development
steps.description: Actionable recommendations tailored to your business context

steps.title: Implementation Support
steps.description: Ongoing guidance to ensure successful execution
